name: All-Defense-Tool
short_description: A List for Defense Tools.

name: Awesome-POC
short_description: A POC knowledge base of various vulnerabilities.

name: AVET
short_description: Post-process exploits containing executable files targeted for Windows machines to avoid being recognized by antivirus software.

name: CarbonCopy
short_description: Creates a spoofed certificate of any online website and signs an Executable for AV evasion.

name: Hyperion
short_description: Runtime encryptor for 32-bit portable executables (PE `.exe`s) to evade antivirus detection.

name: Shellter
short_description: Dynamic shellcode injection tool and the first truly dynamic PE infector ever created.

name: UniByAv
short_description: Obfuscator that takes raw shellcode and generates AV-friendly executables using a brute-forcable 32-bit XOR key.

name: Veil
short_description: Generates Metasploit payloads that bypass common antivirus solutions.

name: peCloakCapstone
short_description: Multi-platform fork of the peCloak.py automated malware antivirus evasion tool.

name: Amber
short_description: Reflective PE packer to convert native PE files to position-independent shellcode for evasion.

name: angr
short_description: A powerful and platform-independent binary analysis framework used for reverse engineering complex binaries.

name: Capstone
short_description: A lightweight, multi-platform disassembly framework supporting multiple architectures.

name: Detect It Easy (DiE)
short_description: A file type identifier tool for Windows, Linux, and macOS focused on reverse engineering binaries.

name: Evan's Debugger
short_description: A debugger similar to OllyDbg but designed for GNU/Linux environments.

name: Frida
short_description: A dynamic instrumentation toolkit ideal for reverse engineering and runtime analysis.

name: Fridax
short_description: A tool to inspect and hook functions in Xamarin/Mono compiled mobile apps using Frida.

name: Ghidra
short_description: A free reverse engineering suite developed by the NSA, offering disassembly, decompilation, and more.

name: Immunity Debugger
short_description: A robust debugger for analyzing malware and writing exploits on Windows systems.

name: IDA Pro
short_description: A multi-platform disassembler and debugger with extensive analysis capabilities.

name: Medusa
short_description: An open-source interactive disassembler with cross-platform support.

name: PyREBox
short_description: A Python-powered reverse engineering sandbox used to analyze malicious software behavior.

name: Radare2
short_description: A complete open-source reverse engineering framework that supports multiple platforms and file types.

name: UEFITool
short_description: A tool to view and modify UEFI firmware images, commonly used for firmware reverse engineering.

name: Voltron
short_description: A Python toolkit for extending and customizing debugger UIs during reverse engineering sessions.

name: WDK/WinDbg
short_description: Microsoft's official Windows debugging and driver development tools.

name: binwalk
short_description: A tool used for analyzing, reverse engineering, and extracting embedded firmware images.

name: boxxy
short_description: A sandbox interaction tool for navigating environments linked to binaries or processes.

name: dnSpy
short_description: A .NET assembly editor and debugger ideal for inspecting and modifying .NET apps.

name: plasma
short_description: An interactive disassembler for various architectures with support for readable pseudo-code output.

name: pwndbg
short_description: An advanced GDB extension aimed at simplifying debugging and reverse engineering workflows.

name: rVMI
short_description: A tool that provides introspection and debugging across user, kernel, and preboot environments.

name: x64dbg
short_description: An open-source debugging utility for Windows supporting both x64 and x32 executables.

name: Anevicon
short_description: A high-performance UDP load generator written in Rust, useful for simulating UDP traffic floods in testing environments.

name: D(HE)ater
short_description: A security tool that sends forged cryptographic handshake messages to force Diffie-Hellman key exchanges, designed for testing cryptographic resilience.

name: HOIC
short_description: An updated DDoS attack tool that allows use of 'boosters' to bypass basic anti-DDoS mechanisms, targeting high-volume HTTP requests.

name: Low Orbit Ion Canon (LOIC)
short_description: A widely known open-source stress testing tool for launching DDoS attacks using TCP, UDP, or HTTP requests.

name: Memcrashed
short_description: A tool exploiting unsecured Memcached servers for amplification DDoS attacks by sending spoofed UDP packets.

name: SlowLoris
short_description: A resource-efficient DoS tool that keeps many connections to a web server open and holds them open as long as possible.

name: T50
short_description: A powerful and flexible stress testing tool that supports multiple protocols for network traffic flooding.

name: UFONet
short_description: A Layer 7 DDoS attack tool leveraging 'zombies' for HTTP GET/POST floods, evasion techniques, proxy chaining, and origin spoofing.

name: DET
short_description: A proof-of-concept tool to exfiltrate data using one or multiple covert channels simultaneously.

name: Iodine
short_description: Tool for tunneling IPv4 data through DNS queries, useful for bypassing firewalls with DNS-only outbound access.

name: TrevorC2
short_description: Command and control framework that disguises data exfiltration as standard web browsing traffic.

name: reconFTW
short_description: Designed to perform automated recon on a target domain by running the best set of tools to perform scanning and finding out vulnerabilities.

name: dnscat2
short_description: Encrypted C2 communication tool leveraging DNS tunneling for stealthy exfiltration.

name: pwnat
short_description: Firewall/NAT bypassing tool for covert connections without port forwarding or external servers.

name: tgcd
short_description: Lightweight TCP/IP tunneling tool to extend internal services across firewalled networks.

name: QueenSono
short_description: ICMP-based data exfiltration tool designed to bypass typical traffic monitoring filters.
